verbs.description: social media posts in suspect name full of hate robert bowers who [ARG0: authorities] [V: said] [ARG1: attacked a pittsburgh synagogue during saturday morning services] appears to have targeted jewish people on a social media account rife with anti - refugee anti - semitic and white supremacist posts the postings which were listed under bowers name on the social media site gab before the account was deactivated saturday afternoon could offer the clearest window into the mind - set of the 46-year - old who police say stormed tree of life synagogue shouting anti - semitic slurs and firing an assault rifle in an attack that left 11 people dead and six wounded including one in critical condition robert bowers trump tammy hepps elyse twitter simone rothstein mark hetfield murder donald trump washington post fbi eastern europe dylann roof louisville pa anti - defamation league wendell hissrich president donald trump afp texas squirrel hill jeffersontown first baptist church scott brady pittsburgh hias us attorney director assault hebrew immigrant aid society facebook kate rothstein gab tree of life synagogue pennsylvania department of motor vehicles us russia devin patrick kelley south carolina charleston tree of life gregory bush sutherland springs
